  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static ResourceController getInstance​(Game model)

    • destroy

      public static ResourceController destroy()

    • addFaithPoints

      public void addFaithPoints​(Player player, Resource faithPoints) throws EndOfGameException
      Public method called all controllers when they need to add faith points to a player's faith track. Calls the faithTrack's method by the same name and handles the VaticanReport exception by calling the validatePopeFavor method on every player. This method doesn't perform any check on the caller since it's called only by other controllers' methods that have already performed their own checks.
      Parameters:
      player - Player who is gaining the additional faith points.
      faithPoints - Resource to be added to the faith track.
      Throws:
      EndOfGameException

    • selectResources

      private void selectResources​(Player player, java.util.Map<Id,​Resource> idResourceMap) throws InvalidDepotException
      Subtracts resources from the strongbox or the warehouse as part of the process in which the user selects how to pay for a production/development card. If the attempt to buy does not succeed, the resetResources method is invoked to place them back.
      Parameters:
      player - Player whose resources are being managed.
      idResourceMap - a map with the source and the resource taken
      Throws:
      InvalidDepotException - The selected Id does not contain the selected resource.

    • resetResources

      public void resetResources​(Player player, java.util.Map<Id,​Resource> resourceHashMap) throws InvalidDepotException
      Puts back the resources into strongbox/warehouse in case an attempt to buy something as failed.
      Parameters:
      player - Player whose resources are being managed.
      resourceHashMap - Resources and the origin at which they must be returned.
      Throws:
      InvalidDepotException - The previously supplied resources are somehow invalid.

    • throwResources

      public void throwResources​(RemoteViewHandler view, User user) throws EndOfGameException
      Called when the player ends processing the resources gained from the market. Counts the wasted resources, sets tempResources to null and adds faith points to other players if needed.
      Parameters:
      view - the player's corresponding RealRemoteViewHandler that will handle status messages to be sent back to the view.
      user - the User corresponding to the player making the action.
      Throws:
      EndOfGameException

    • tidyWarehouse

      public void tidyWarehouse​(ClientTidyWarehouseMessage action, RemoteViewHandler view, User user)
      Called when a player want to withdraw Resources from a depot in order. to put them in an other depot or if he want to throw them.
      Parameters:
      action - the ClientMessage containing information about the player's action.
      view - the player's corresponding RealRemoteViewHandler that will handle status messages to be sent back to the view.
      user - the User corresponding to the player making the action.

    • depositIntoWarehouse

      public void depositIntoWarehouse​(ClientDepositIntoWarehouseMessage action, RemoteViewHandler view, User user)
      Called when a player is depositing Resources from the tempResources acquired from the market in one of his depots. Removes the selected resource from tempResources.
      Parameters:
      action - the ClientMessage containing information about the player's action.
      view - the player's corresponding RealRemoteViewHandler that will handle status messages to be sent back to the view.
      user - the User corresponding to the player making the action.

    • depositResourceIntoSlot

      public void depositResourceIntoSlot​(ClientDepositResourceIntoSlotMessage action, RemoteViewHandler view, User user)
      Called when a player is selecting how to pay for either a production or a development card. Leverages the slot and resource closet methods.
      Parameters:
      action - the ClientMessage containing information about the player's action.
      view - the player's corresponding RealRemoteViewHandler that will handle status messages to be sent back to the view.
      user - the User corresponding to the player making the action.

    • activateProduction

      public void activateProduction​(ClientActivateProductionMessage action, RemoteViewHandler view, User user) throws EndOfGameException
      Called when the user has selected and paid for all the production they wish to activate. Toggles the main action from the player.
      Parameters:
      view - the player's corresponding RealRemoteViewHandler that will handle status messages to be sent back to the view.
      user - the User corresponding to the player making the action.
      Throws:
      EndOfGameException
